channel.title: StockHedges
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from StockHedges, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Australian Winemaker to Benefit as China Uncorks Imports
item.description: With a large market in need of refills, Treasury Wine offers good value.

item.title: Salesforce tops earnings estimates, CFO Amy Weaver to step down
item.description: Salesforce reported robust fiscal second-quarter results that beat estimates and raised its full-year profit outlook.

item.title: Macy's Doesn't Need a Miracle to Lift Its Stock
item.description: Attention to detail at the top and better execution in stores might be all it takes.

item.title: Best Buy raises full-year profit guidance after earnings and revenue beat
item.description: Best Buy now expects to see full-year adjusted earnings per share in the range of $6.10 to $6.35, up from a prior range of $5.75 to $6.20.

item.title: Nvidia Can't Escape Shadow of AI Spending Fears
item.description: Strong results from the chip maker don’t ease worries about durability of Big Tech’s AI investments.

item.title: Nvidia shares dip in premarket trade despite earnings beating estimates
item.description: Nvidia shares fell 4.5% in U.S. premarket trade on Thursday despite its fiscal second-quarter results beating estimates.

item.title: The Alleged Kickback Schemes That Inflated Costs for Homebuyers
item.description: District of Columbia settles with four title companies over close ties with real-estate agents.

item.title: Why Cramer advises against running out to buy Nvidia's post-earnings stock dip
item.description: Nvidia's financials released after Wednesday's close weren't quite the $4 billion "Triple Lindy" of upside many investors were hoping for.

item.title: The Disconcerting Signal Behind China's Epic Bond Rally
item.description: Traders have been piling into Chinese government bonds, pushing yields to record lows. The rally has elicited an unusual response from the central ban...

item.title: Salesforce gets back on track — here's what the software giant needs to deliver next
item.description: The enterprise software giant showed it remains committed to profitable growth. There's still more work to do.
